Title: Full restart at Freeport LNG “not expected until late 2022,” partial restart in 90 days targeted
Description: Freeport LNG expects its shuttered 15 mtpa LNG export facility of the same name in Texas will likely remain offline until later this year, which significantly extends the shutdown period of the plant beyond the earlier guidance of “a minimum of three weeks.”
Author: CK

Title: ADNOC LNG issues tender to sell 12 cargoes loading in 2023-24
Description: Abu Dhabi’s state-owned ADNOC LNG has issued a tender to sell 12 LNG cargoes that will load at its 5.8 mtpa Das Island LNG plant in 2023 and 2024, following the deadline on June 9 for expressions of interest to buy the cargoes. The tender closes on June 24.
Author: CK

Title: Kogas seeks LNG cargoes again for delivery from July to March 2023
Description: Korea’s state-owned Kogas is seeking LNG cargoes for delivery between July and March next year through a tender, after closing an earlier tender about a month ago to buy up to 20 cargoes over the same period. The new tender closes today.
Author: CK
